title: Immersive Virtual Reality-Based Plant Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of fundamental biology terminology and plant structures
context.additional_context: Learners access IVR content asynchronously via personal devices, with project-based assessments measuring learning outcomes. Includes activities analyzing plant growth patterns through mathematical modeling

learning_goals: Learners can explain the photosynthesis mechanism while exploring plant cell structures in 3D within an IVR environment.
Learners can analyze the impact of environmental variables (light, water, nutrients) on growth rates using mathematical models through virtual plant growth simulations.
Learners can complete a project proposing sustainable plant cultivation strategies based on IVR learning experiences using collaborative tools.

resources: BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) Support Technical Guidelines

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
